attributes.action: Stop the sale of May and Baker in Dagenham
attributes.background:
May & Baker to become a Mosque!!!!
Well that's exactly what's needed isn't it. Bye bye bar bye bye football bye bye our way of life!!
With councils now allowed to keep proceeds of their sale of assets what did we really expect???!
Public Hearing 2nd December at May & Bakers.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on Barking and Dagenham Council, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You can find out how to petition the council here:

https://www.lbbd.gov.uk/council/get-involved/petitions/e-petition/

You can also use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them: 
  
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
